summary: Build a customer registration app for Star Maharashtra Galaxy Internet with multi-step registration, document verification, terms acceptance, and OTP verification.
architectural_notes: Registration is a 4-step flow: Details -> Document Upload -> Terms -> OTP Verification
Add an Admin Panel for viewing saved registrations, restricted to a single admin user (access control mechanism TBD).

existing_features.title: Create a multi-step customer registration flow for “Star Maharashtra Galaxy Internet” with 4 steps: (1) Customer Details, (2) Verification Documents, (3) Terms and Conditions, (4) OTP Verification. Use English for all user-facing UI text.

Implement Step 1 (Customer Details) form fields and validations: First Name, Middle Name, Surname, Phone Number, Date of Birth, Email ID, Address; Customer Category (Residential/Commercial); Payment Option (Cash/UPI); Router Provision (Provided Free of Cost/Chargeable). Ensure required fields are validated before allowing navigation to Step 2.

Implement Step 2 (Verification Documents) to allow uploading exactly two document copies: Aadhaar Card and PAN Card. The UI must show selected file name(s), allow replacing/removing a selected file before submission, and block moving to Step 3 until both documents are provided.
Implement Step 3 (Terms and Conditions) page displaying the provided terms as readable bullet points/sections and require explicit user agreement (checkbox) before proceeding to Step 4.

Implement Step 4 (OTP Verification) UI with: mobile number input (prefilled from Step 1 but editable if needed), “Generate OTP” action, OTP input, and “Verify” action. Display clear status and error messages for OTP generation and verification.

Implement backend OTP generation and verification: generate a 6-digit OTP tied to a phone number with a short expiry, store it temporarily in canister state, and verify user-submitted OTP. Because external SMS sending is not available, the system must not attempt any SMS integration; OTP delivery must be simulated via UI messaging only.

Implement frontend-backend wiring with React Query so the registration flow submits data to the canister only after OTP verification succeeds; handle loading/error states and prevent double submissions.

Define and apply a coherent visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, form layout) appropriate for an ISP customer onboarding experience, consistently across all 4 steps. Avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette.
Implement an Admin Panel in the frontend that allows the single admin to view customer submissions (registrations) in a readable list and inspect individual submission details.
Add React Query wiring for admin operations (claim admin access, fetch registrations list, fetch single registration) with clear loading and error states and prevention of accidental double actions.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create multi-page customer registration flow (personal details, category, payment option, router provision)
Add verification documents upload page (Aadhaar card and PAN card copy uploads)
Add terms and conditions page requiring customer agreement
Add OTP verification page (generate OTP to mobile number, enter OTP, verify)

Add backend canister support to persist completed registrations, including: customer details, chosen options (category/payment/router), terms acceptance timestamp, and references to uploaded documents. Provide a query endpoint to list/retrieve saved registrations for basic admin/testing visibility.
Add an Admin Panel with single-admin access to view customer submissions/registrations (admin-only viewer rights).
Add single-admin authorization to the backend so that viewing customer submissions is restricted to exactly one admin identity.
Secure the existing customer submissions query APIs so they are not publicly accessible to anonymous users and non-admin authenticated users.
